detail_desc: Dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Nightshirt in soft jersey with short sleeves and slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose blend.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a cotton knit. Jumper with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.
Longer cardigan in a soft ribbed knit with dropped shoulders, no buttons, front pockets and slits in the sides.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.
Imitation leather trainers with snakeskin-patterned details, a lightly padded top edge and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a racer back and rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in an airy, slub cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Fitted, long-sleeved cardigan in a soft rib knit that is open at the front with ties.

Calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and short sleeves with a high slit and ties. Gathered seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt that flares gently to the hem. Unlined.
Cropped, boxy-style T-shirt in pima cotton jersey. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and short slits in the sides.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with an all-over print. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fitted jacket in a crinkled weave with fake front pockets, an asymmetric front and concealed zip at the cuffs. No fasteners.
Baby Exclusive. Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in cable-knit organic cotton. Jumper with buttons at the back of the neck. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Top in cotton jersey with smocking at the top and narrow tie-top shoulder straps.
Parka in soft, washed cotton twill with a detachable hood and a zip down the front. Lined.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a reversible sequin motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted skirt in stretch jersey with covered elastication at the waist.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cropped blouse in an airy viscose and cotton weave with short puff sleeves and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Smocking with a small frill trim around the sleeves and hem.

Super push-up lace bra with decorative straps at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Jumper in a soft knit containing glittery threads with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with a zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, side and back pockets, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Warm-lined ankle boots in imitation leather with square toes, a zip in one side and block heels. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 9 cm.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Sleeveless dress in printed jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Wide-fitting dress in a patterned viscose weave with short, flounced sleeves and a seam at the back with buttons at the top. Unlined.
Lace top with a small stand-up collar and an opening with ties at the back of the neck. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Blouse in a textured Tencel™ lyocell weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Straight-cut hem with a drawstring and tie at the back and slits in the sides.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains with pendants. Adjustable length 42-49 cm.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue, loop at the back, lacing at the front and a zip in one side. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Alice band covered with patterned fabric with a large, decorative bow at the top.
Jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short, pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a tab and metal D-rings at the waist, zip fly and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with a decorative seam down the front and slit at the front of the hems.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details. Extra-high waist, a button fly and gently tapered legs with raw-edge hems.

Blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck, covered buttons at the top, gathers at the shoulders and a gathered yoke at the back. Elasticated seam under the bust and long sleeves with a covered button at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with an interactive appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in woven fabric with a deep V-neck and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Detachable tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and straight, wide legs. Unlined.

Shirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Short dress in airy, patterned viscose crêpe with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and short sleeves with a tie detail. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

prod_name: Matt black SF regular fit blz
detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons down the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently shaped waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette. For the matching trousers, search on 0391772.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with concealed adjustable elastication at the waist, a zip fly and button and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Patterned silicone bracelet. Size 2.3x21 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in a soft weave with a grandad collar, decorative chest pocket with a button and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.
Jumpsuit in jersey with draping. Deep V-neck, wrapover top, gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a stretch cotton blend. Slim fit.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with asymmetric cut-outs at the hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.

Knee-length dress in soft, lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access. Long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the waist.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Shaftless socks in thin cotton jersey with a silicone trim around the heel.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a cotton blend.
Knee-length, long-sleeved dress in stretch viscose jersey with a sheen. Gentle draping at the top, and an asymmetric skirt with gathers and a draped detail at the side. Lined.

Block-patterned windbreaker in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and lined, detachable hood with a hook and loop strap. Zip down the front with a chin guard, welt side pockets, elasticated cuffs and a ribbed hem. Lined.
Knee-length twill shorts with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly, diagonal side pockets and flap back pockets with concealed press-studs.

Maxi dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with gathers around the neckline. Opening at the back with a tie at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and a slit at the back. Lined.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Leggings in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a print motif and sequins.
Long-sleeved dress in soft velour made from a cotton blend with a seam at the waist and wide flounce at the hem.
Satin-covered metal Alice band with large spotted-mesh ears and a spotted veil at the front.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a small embroidery detail on the chest, collar with a contrasting colour lining, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and super-skinny legs with uneven, raw-edge hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Sports joggers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, taped details and side pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for extra mobility and wide ribbed hems.
Ballet pumps in imitation leather with a decoration on the front, grosgrain trim around the opening and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in crinkled jersey with a lace detail at the front and elastication with a decorative drawstring around the top. Short sleeves with a pompom trim.
Reversible bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets at the front, and ribbed cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved dresses in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and flounced skirt.
